What is your return policy?: Returns are accepted within 30 days with receipt.
How do I track my order?: Use the tracking number sent via email.
What payment methods do you accept?: Credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
What are your business hours?: Our support team is available 24/7. For billing and sales, we operate Monday–Friday, 9am–6pm IST.
How can I reset my password?: Click “Forgot password” on the sign-in page and follow the email instructions. If you don't receive an email within 5 minutes, check spam or contact support.
Do you offer refunds?: Yes. We offer a 14-day refund window on annual plans. Monthly plans are refundable within 7 days of purchase.
How do I contact support?: Email support@example.com or use the in‑app Help widget to open a ticket. Urgent issues can be escalated by selecting Priority: High.
Is my data secure?: We use industry-standard encryption in transit and at rest. You can request a Data Processing Addendum (DPA) for compliance needs.
